mapper.sql: app_id, versionname, versioncode, create_time, update_time, url, a_id, `status`, update_type, `size`, extra, context, publish_time, dr
mapper.insert: insert into t_app (app_id, versionname, versioncode, create_time, update_time, url, a_id, `status`, update_type, `size`, extra, context, publish_time, dr) values (#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{versioncode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{context,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT})

insert into t_app
app_id,
versionname,
versioncode,
create_time,
update_time,
url,
a_id,
`status`,
update_type,
`size`,
extra,
context,
publish_time,
dr,

mapper.update:
update t_app
versionname = #{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR},
versioncode = #{versioncode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
update_type = #{updateType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
`size` = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER},
extra = #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR},
context = #{context,jdbcType=CHAR},
publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_app set versionname = #{versionname,jdbcType=CHAR}, versioncode = #{versioncode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, a_id = #{aId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_type = #{updateType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `size` = #{size,jdbcType=INTEGER}, extra = #{extra,jdbcType=CHAR}, context = #{context,jdbcType=CHAR}, publish_time = #{publishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, dr = #{dr,jdbcType=TINYINT} where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select a.app_id as appId, a.publish_time as publishTime, au.username, a.versionname as versionName, a.size, a.update_type as updateType, a.context, s.soft_channel_id as chanId, s.name as chanName, a.status, a.extra from t_app a left join t_app_plu_ch tpc on a.app_id = tpc.app_id left join t_soft_channel s on tpc.soft_channel_id = s.soft_channel_id left join t_admin_user au on a.a_id = au.a_id
and a.app_id = #{aId}
